author: Kevin Diedrich
description: As the ice melts, dilution opens and amplifies this spirit-forward, piney, bittersweet, delicately nutty cocktail.
name: Tender Nob
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice)
